p: β-caryophyllene oxide-TyrRS (1JIJ) interactions: Gly38, Asp40, Thr42, His47, Thr75, Asp80, Ser82, Lys84, Arg88, Tyr170, Gln174, Asp195 and Gln196 residues were involved in the stability of TyrRS-β-caryophyllene oxide (−6.5 kcal/mol) by van der Waals interactions, Alkyl/Pi-Alkyl interaction with Ala39 (5.12) and His50 (4.78) and only one H-bond with His50 (2.19).
